response.overview: The protagonists, Raul, Agustin, and Jose, are immigrant workers who arrived seeking opportunities to support their families back home. As the story unfolds, a crucial fourth protagonist joins in helping address the challenges these laborers face: Luis. With his experience as a long-time day laborer, Luis shows the three protagonists the paths they can take to avoid becoming victims of crime. In January 2024, a series of incidents occurred in Utah that placed these workers in a vulnerable position, leading Luis to question the safety and rights of day laborers.  synopsis taken from Documental Jornalero Una Mirada Al Frente youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kT47lIAQV14
response.title: Day-Laborer: a Look Ahead

results.name: Jornalero, Una Mirada Al Frente | Trailer
